ValidationRule.description: Prevents closure of Late Payroll cases if the Payroll Submission status is left at "Behind"
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: RecordTypeId = "01237000000Aho7" && ISPICKVAL(Sub_Category__c, "Late Payroll") && ISPICKVAL( Plan__r.Payroll_Submission_Status__c , "Behind") && ISPICKVAL( Status , "Resolved")
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Payroll Submissions Status value on the Plan must be changed from "Behind" to appropriate value before late payroll case can be resolved.
